nodes.text: Zotar was a male Human Knight of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. The Exarch of the Old World, he also participated in gladiatorial combat in the Arena Grand, where he obtained such titles as "The Bringer of Death", The High Justice of Pain" and "The Emperor of Agony". By 3630 BBY Zotar held the title of the Eternal Champion of the Arena, for which he was challenged by the "the Mysterious Stranger". Zotar faced his challenger in After Shock, a captured Galactic Republic walker, but was nevertheless defeated in the tenth and last round of the Arena fights.
Zotar appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the tenth and final boss of the "Eternal Championship".
